TemplateConfiguration._Description: Creates an ASP.NET Web.config file for an application.

TemplateFiles.File:
<?xml version="1.0" ?> <!-- Web.config file for ${ProjectName}.
The settings that can be used in this file are documented at http://www.mono-project.com/Config_system.web and http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b5ysx397.aspx --> <configuration> <system.web> <compilation debug="true" targetFramework="4.5" /> <httpRuntime targetFramework="4.5" /> </system.web> </configuration>
